EmailTemplate.name: SM-2019-02-ELA - Thank You.EMAIL-Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Gift Card for Completing the Licensing & Compliance Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-vmware-ela/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4fVAAQ]]> <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-vmware-ela/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4fVAAQ]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for completing our Licensing and Compliance in the Cloud Era Survey, your insight is greatly appreciated! As a reward for your time, your $10 gift card is enclosed below.
Based on your responses I think you might also like this on-demand webinar, How to Optimize Your VMware ELA <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/on-demand-webinars/webinar-how-to-optimize-your-vmware-ela/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRWOAA2]]>. In 30-minutes, you will learn:
- Key capabilities & value of the VMware Portfolio - How to evaluate your cloud migration and investment alongside your ELA - How to optimize your investments and significantly shrink your ELA
Regards, Megan
{{my.Gift 10:default=edit me}}
